properties.areaDesc: Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 6 at 5:17AM AKST until January 7 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Snow accumulation of 5 to 9 inches.

* WHERE...Portions of the eastern gulf coast including Pelican and
Elfin Cove.

* WHEN...Noon today through 6 AM Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Heavy snow will be difficult
to manage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will begin this afternoon and
persist through Monday night before easing early Tuesday
morning.
properties.instruction:
A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or
imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY
